usage.cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。
usage.eng: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair , but the chalice of opportunity.

usage.cn: 命运决定谁会进入我们的生活，内心决定我们与谁并肩。
usage.eng: Destiny determines who comes into our lives but it's the heart that decides who stays inside.

usage.cn: 也许，路并没有错的，错的只是选择；爱并没有错的，错的只是缘分。
usage.eng: Maybe the fault does not lie in the way but in the choice．And there is nothing wrong in love，but in destiny．

usage.cn: 无论命运以怎样残忍的方式带给一个人不幸，仍会相应地赐予他幸福与甜蜜。
usage.eng: No matter how cruel the destiny treats one with misfortune, it will correspondingly treat him with happiness and sweetness.
